column6:
Nothing -- not The Mink, not The Nowhere Man, not hordes of zombified robots or robotified zombies, not even poisoned hamburgers -- can possibly stop Omega The Unknown from concluding his story in this tenth issue of this precedent-smashing miniseries. Learn the final fates of Alex, Amanda, Fenton and their friends -- as well as the answer to this question: if one of Manhattan's costumed defenders perishes, can anyone take his place?,2008,7
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Farel Dalrymple | colorist:Paul Hornschemeier | writer:Jonathan Lethem
